name: Lonequest
description:
The year is 3048. Nuclear war has left earth barren with minimal resources. As one of the last humans on earth, you are left to use your ultra sonar gun to explore and survive a post-apocalyptic, mine filled terrain.

X = START/RADAR, ARROWS = MOVE(TANK CONTROLS)

Lonequest was created for GGJ17 using the theme: waves.
